<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Annotations lets you mark points and ranges inside source code, for tests:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">///    Annotations Example(R&quot;cpp(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///       int complete() &#123; x.pri^ &#125;         // ^ indicates a point</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///       void err() &#123; &#91;&#91;&quot;hello&quot; == 42&#93;&#93;; &#125; // &#91;&#91;this is a range&#93;&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">///       $definition^class Foo&#123;&#125;;          // points can be named: &quot;definition&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///       $(foo)^class Foo&#123;&#125;;               // ...or have a payload: &quot;foo&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">///       $definition(foo)^class Foo&#123;&#125;;     // ...or both</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">///       $fail(runtime)&#91;&#91;assert(false)&#93;&#93;   // ranges can have names/payloads too</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///    )cpp&quot;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">///    StringRef Code = Example.code();             // annotations stripped.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">///    std::vector&lt;size&#95;t&gt; PP = Example.points();   // all unnamed points</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">///    size&#95;t P = Example.point();                  // there must be exactly one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">///    llvm::Range R = Example.range(&quot;fail&quot;);       // find named ranges</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Points/ranges are coordinated into &#96;code()&#96; which is stripped of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// annotations.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Names consist of only alphanumeric characters or &#39;&#95;&#39;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Payloads can contain any character expect &#39;(&#39; and &#39;)&#39;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Ranges may be nested (and points can be inside ranges), but there&#39;s no way</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to define general overlapping ranges.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// FIXME: the choice of the marking syntax makes it impossible to represent</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">///        some of the C++ and Objective C constructs (including common ones</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///        like C++ attributes). We can fix this by:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">///          1 introducing an escaping mechanism for the special characters,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///          2 making characters for marking points and ranges configurable,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">///          3 changing the syntax to something less commonly used,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">///          4 ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/annotations"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/annotations/#a0ac05d465c3984a3a3fe146902cf3759">Annotations</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Two offsets pointing to a continuous substring. End is not included, i.e.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// represents a half-open range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#ade0567803caf1669f42d474104c538b4"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#ade0567803caf1669f42d474104c538b4">Begin</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#aad3d015dd476bf919490962ee304b847"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#aad3d015dd476bf919490962ee304b847">End</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#a249ceeeb51200bcd8362f6e338218d9e"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">friend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#a249ceeeb51200bcd8362f6e338218d9e">operator==</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &amp;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &amp;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::tie(L.Begin, L.End) == std::tie(R.Begin, R.End);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#a54c67eb6c7f3bdb91ae65e72e5236cc6"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">friend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#a54c67eb6c7f3bdb91ae65e72e5236cc6">operator!=</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &amp;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &amp;R) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !(L == R); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Parses the annotations from Text. Crashes if it&#39;s malformed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// All points and ranges are relative to this stripped text.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/annotations/#af1328f94ed0737dc650cb35b50b4c850"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">llvm::StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/annotations/#af1328f94ed0737dc650cb35b50b4c850">code</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Code; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
